channel.title: Tving on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Tving on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Squid Game’ Season 3 Powers Netflix Lead as Korea’s Premium VOD Market Hits $1.1 Billion, Report Finds
item.description: The Korean streaming wars are heating up. New data shows the country’s premium video-on-demand sector reached $1.1 billion in revenue during the first half of 2025, with subscriber numbers climb
